column3: â€œMy first time giving a strain a perfect 10! Thank you GTA in Phoenix for this fine specimen. 50/50 effects. Two hits out of the bubbler was all i needed for hours. And then I watched this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WqWxys3P_nI a nice complement to the dosage. Very cerebral and psychoactive effects at first then a very fun and functional stone for way longer than i expected. I smoke not only for medicinal but also...â€

â€œOne of only two strains I've ever smoked that's given me energy. I find that my thoughts are very focused, and I can carry on conversations exceptionally well. Great strain for sitting around and talking. Very social strain. It actually made me want to dance!â€

â€œSmoked this strain yesterday and about 10 min in I was ready to tackle house work. I have back pain due to breaking my lower back as a kid. Pain was gone! I did notice that emotions were amplified, hubby and I watched Furious 7 and it was intense. All around I loved the energy you get with Green Ribbon and will def use this many more times. â¤ï¸â€

â€œGreen Ribbon - The best strain I have found found daytime pain relief. Functional and energizing. I must say that i prefer smoking this strain over vaporizing, when I vaped it made me tired when it wore off. Green Ribbon, like I had, top 3 strain for me.â€
â€œDense ore like nugs of light green blood orange hairs with milky trichomes abound one of my favorite strains to smoke out of my TsunamiÂ® bubbler. Breezin like George Benson on a summer dayâ€
â€œThis strain is like a great drive in golf.  It takes off fast and low and then just starts riding higher to perfection.  She's a real beauty!â€

â€œAfter having this strain years ago, it stood out as one of my ALL-TIME favorites. Itâ€™s the perfect sativa. Immediately and comfortably picks you up and you unbelievably happy. Like, you almost canâ€™t take it youâ€™re so on top of the world. Disney World and Christmas combined. Visuals are surprisingly sharp, but a narrow focus/depth-of-field results in almost 2D / flattening effect. Not bad, just reminds me slickly desi...â€
â€œNo nonsense sativa. Great taste and smell!â€
â€œGreat strain for morning and day time use.  Provided me with plenty of energy and no paranoia. Try some if you ever come across it, you will not be disappointed.â€

â€œ- Super tasty
- Super snappy for  b-rips
- High energy
- Super focus
- Better than Jack Herer
- As good as Blue Dreamâ€
â€œGreen Rib is my FAVORITE hybrid! I felt highly euphoric today, on waxâ€
â€œGood strain for daytime use. Super bright green color with a very pungent smellâ€

â€œHaving searched for higher THC strains to vape from a PAX 2, I came across Green Ribbon. The effects are strong and come on in a few minutes. The sensation is low on body high, although relaxing, and high on cerebral, providing energy and focus. This would be a useful  strain for working on projects, writing or making art, playing music, or cleaning the damn house. Only negatives is that it may lean a bit too far int...â€

â€œIf in moderate doses, this strain can be amazing! I am not much of a Sativa guy, but this strain is one of my favorites now. I picked up a gram from a local dispensary that tests the amount of THC and it registered 18.8 percent. I started off with a couple hits from my pipe and journeyed out into world. I had an instant buzz which was quite energetic and peaceful at the same time. I wouldn't stop talking my girls ear...â€
â€œGiggles and Happiness.  Almost an Phycadellic High when taken on a Low Tolerance.  A lot of Remembering Forgotten Memories.â€
â€œTaste so good make you wanna slap your mommaâ€
â€œTaste so good make you wanna slap your mommaâ€

â€œJust smoked this strain for the first time today. Gave me so much energy, but at the same time I could comfortably sit down and enjoy a movie. I like how it doesn't get you smacked, and you can still function in social settings. Very potent and fruity smelling. Came straight from the grower and was amazing. So far my favorite strand of Sativa, I'm not much of a Sativa person but I really enjoyed it.â€
â€œGiggles and Happiness.  Almost an Phycadellic High when taken on a Low Tolerance.  A lot of Remembering Forgotten Memories.â€
â€œBattling PTSD and after tasting this for the first time I had an irremovable smile for the first time in weeks. Only draw for me was that the euphoria doesn't last.â€

â€œGreat strain, amazing flavor profile, great parent strains potency is there 
Great for stress, and eating disorders pretty relaxing but not such a sleepy strain very focused and uplifted.
This particular strain is great for kicking back and grabbing a bite with a friend and talking it up
Unfortunately I can't find any seeds for sale of this one it's very rare much like most of my favorite strains its just seems great...â€

â€œ2 of my favorite strains are crossed with Green Ribbon! When I realized that just now, I started hunting! Itâ€™s euphoria without complete sedation or total obliteration. Makes me much more active & happy, when mixed with GG4 (The Sauce).  
Active but no pain. Gotta love that!!â€
â€œThis is definitely my favorite strain so far. I have really bad anxiety. It creates a clear headed and functional high, which is what I was looking for.â€
â€œThis is amazing, one of the best buds I've had! I would highly recommend this to any of my friends for a daily social environment high.â€
â€œAwesome strong, breezy high with some body effects. Very potent and very impressed!â€

â€œGreen Crack x Afghani X Trainwreck.  Beautiful light green nugs covered in white trichromes. Bud almost looks like white widow.  Has that unmistakeable trainwreck taste to it with a slight spicy haze kick.  Definitely sativa dominant but was still a very hard hitter.  Wonderful euphoric high without the racinessof some sativas.  Has enough Indica in there to balance out the effect which I am greatful for.  I dont usu...â€

â€œIn my top 10 for sure its probably #7, reminds me of my #3 fav sour d. You definitely feel the sativa after the 3rd puff. A cerebral high no doubt, followed by a energetic feeling about 5min after smoking that I love. Also very frosty with a sweet smell & earthy taste.â€
â€œi ended up partying too hard one night and had 2 hours to spare before work. Completely took me out of the hangover and gave me the best energy rush ive EVER had. my favorite for sure!â€

â€œGreat smoke and flavor, left me energetic and able to get things done while maintaining a nice long mellow high.â€

â€œOut of the hundreds of strains consumed through various mediums, this one is average. It is a social strain that did provide any anxiolytic relief. On the contrary: its created an abundance of anxiety and paranoia in both private and social situations, in both negative and positive cognitive biases (that is, moods and predispositions,environment, etc). Felt strung-out and unfocused with grogginess and an apathy that ...â€

â€œGreat for pain relief, stress relief, and stimulating your appetite. However.
As a newer medical marijuana patient I have to say this strain gave me some issues.
If I smoked as much Green Ribbon as the amount of bud I normally do, I'd get a really intense pressure/throbbing in the front of my forehead.. not pleasant at all. It goes away after an hour or so but after that I'd be so tired I could barely function. I fel...â€
â€œgreat head high, very pungent. amazing strain recommended any timeâ€

â€œtastes great, smells good, feels powerful. 

I always feel the need to be productive with this strain.â€

â€œI have a new Pax 2 vaporizer which I love, but it seems as if I puff 3x as much to get the same high as smoking from a pipe. In search of stronger bud to vape, something suitable for daytime consumption when there is shit to do, I came across Green Ribbon. It tested at 24+% THC and as you'd expect, this weed gets you lit. I feel very awake, very aware, with heightened senses. Primarily heady, less body high. My probl...â€
â€œPretty Stoney High... THC was almost 26% so it definitely packs a decent punch.  Gave me the hard core munchies.â€

gets me nice and high but makes me super dizzy. that's like the best and the worst part of weed. when I smoke it I just have to stay really still lolâ€

â€œgreat strain, lots of cotton mouth for me with this strain though, but the high is great.â€

â€œGreen Ribbon by Fireline in Washington State. Tested at 27.4% THC.
Large bright green buds covered in trichomes, and a sprinkling of orange hairs.
The aroma is a very fresh, light citrus smell with floral notes on the surface, only to be amplified once broken down.
The inhale is smooth, and provides a delicious light taste of citrus, while the exhale lends more flavor towards a light earthy and floral taste.
The effe...â€
â€œA well rounded hybrid that gives the down to earth feel of an indica and the space ride of a sativa.â€
â€œNice sativa feeling hybrid, wasn't too fond of the taste, other than that it was a good high.â€
â€œgreat strain, lots of cotton mouth for me with this strain though, but the high is great.â€

â€œJust copped some of this from Buds4U Florence, OR. Dense and aromatic. Tasty stuff! Effects come on quickly, nice happy high with feelings of sociability and enthusiasm. I felt I was able to maintain thought processes and conversation, but also a nice dose of physical relaxation. As always, your results may vary - but personally, I'm enjoying it thoroughly.â€

â€œGreen Ribbon by Fireline in Washington State. Tested at 27.4% THC.
Large bright green buds covered in trichomes, and a sprinkling of orange hairs.
The aroma is a very fresh, light citrus smell with floral notes on the surface, only to be amplified once broken down.
The inhale is smooth, and provides a delicious light taste of citrus, while the exhale lends more flavor towards a light earthy and floral taste.
The effe...â€

â€œUmm... This strain is good for sleep but that's about it. Not a happy high. It made both my husband and I cranky and pissy. More body high than I prefer, but not totally couch locked. I medicate at night after work and this was not stress-relieving or fun. I feel like it was a wasted high. It will help you sleep well, just avoid people, activity and all forms of stimulation before bed. Smells fantastic.â€
â€œHelps my anxiety, and helps uplift my mood. Slightly energizing.â€
â€œA well rounded hybrid that gives the down to earth feel of an indica and the space ride of a sativa.â€
â€œgreat steady high, the sativa characteristics really stand out. Taste was nice and mellow. I perfered smoking it out of a bong over joints,blunts and vaped.â€
â€œHelps my anxiety, and helps uplift my mood. Slightly energizing.â€
â€œI really enjoyed the high. I feel very relaxed, calm. I can still focus. nice high.â€
â€œgreat weed great hiâ€
â€œgreat strain! definitely a mood lifter here! seems to help me focus on tasks at hand and helps with my racing mind.â€
â€œGreen Ribbon has a great, wakeful buzz (especially in contrast to a lot of the weed that seems to be going around)... pleasant, sweet taste and fine smell. Just the right potency.â€

â€œI give it five stars for its growing abilities. It's a vigorous strain and it grows tall and bushy while having a sizable yield. The effects of the flower are great too, which makes it a double threat.â€

â€œA well rounded hybrid that gives the down to earth feel of an indica and the space ride of a sativa.â€
â€œLike the strain up at first then relaxed.â€

â€œI'm usually more of an indica guy, but I absolutely loved this hybrid. This strain has a good, heady mind high. Pain and stress melt away as well, muscles start to feel very stretchy. I'm not usually giggly when stoned, but I was not only euphoric - I was full on giggly and talkative. I don't think I could socialize on this, but great strain for low pressure social situations. :)â€
â€œlove it! amazingly uplifting and long lasting. I had to grow to love the taste, but zero complaints about this strainâ€
â€œQuality bud - tastes and smells amazing. Energetic and creative effects are top notch. Certainly one to try if you find it at your local flower shop.â€

â€œThis bud was good but I expected more from it after my friend said top shelf. A chill sativa with a hint of indica, but nothing that really blows you away.â€

â€œPicked up some nug run cake icing from Dabstract it's complete fire kinda pricey but so worth it. It has a lot of Sativa traits there's definitely plenty of energy but with some nice muscle relaxation more common in an Indica and the flavor is very pungent and earthy but with a sweet hint of something fruity this is really really good when you low temp this stuff the flavor is almost overwhelming it's awesome!â€

â€œWhat a great strain for wake-n-bake, very energetic and open minded. It really help me get out of the house to do outdoor walking by the ocean. The rate the effect a medium-low, it took a while for the bud to hit me(only had two bowls) and has a flowery-earth taste. Definetly a pain relifer.ğŸ˜Šâ€
â€œDecent overall bud.  Looks good, smokes and tastes ok.  Potency is ok.  Just another good road weed.â€
â€œThis is a truly active sativa dominant strain that really gets me going....â€

â€œBC Indoor Grown. Great strain for when you wanna relax but not go to sleep yet. Very calm focused high. Perfect for when you come home from work or school, etc. and you just wanna take it easy but it keeps me alert and focused enough to play video games. The taste was very light and earthy on inhale, and sweet and herbal like green tea on exhale. The buds are fluffy and caked in sugary trichomes.â€

â€œI'm still experimenting to find the right strain for me, but this one felt like what wake and bake should be! For a good 20-30 minutes I felt so good and a slight relaxtion to the point I was slumping. But as I thought I was sobering up I realized I was full of energy and everything was alittle brighter. I saw the sunlight blanket the leaves and feel the cold wind. Just leave it at a great wake and bake, and mood boo...â€
â€œVery sweet smell with a flower the produced thick clouds. I enjoyed the almost caffeine like wave of energy after smoking a few hits. Definitely not messing around.â€

â€œThis strain will have you wide awake, social, and a tad out of it at times. The burn was amazing! It tasted very piney, and had that earthy smell to it. Definitely try some if you get the chance.â€
â€œgr8 smell also smokes very berry. don't have 1 complaint. .â€

â€œThis strain a good day time strain... Very mild and just enough to change your outlook on life without rendering you completely useless... Spark up and tap into your creative side... Should you smoke this strain? Yes... Yes you should.â€

â€œNice strain, pretty mellow effects. Good for just chilling out. At first it felt like more of a sativa but about two hours in I definitely felt more of a crash. I don't suggest it for daytime use if you want to get something done.â€
â€œvery happy mellow and focused!â€

â€œThis strain had a beautiful floral aroma, with undertones of pungence, almost like rotten meat (in a good way haha). Taste was amazing, very floral and sweet, what floral flavored candy would taste like. The buzz is an uplifting, chatty talkative high. Definitely good if you have to be around folks in public (in moderation). I say bc too much will have you giggling and laughing. Strong strain, I would have to agree t...â€

â€œVaporized in a Da Buddha at 1:00 position 

Got a gram of this last night and loved it so much I went back today and got more.

Really lovely, bright, happy, clear, focused head with an energetic light body. Great daytime strain. I was painting and had great control of my watercolors. 

Pain, muscle tension and nausea were also gone. In fact, a half hour after I vaped this, I was able to release a muscle in my jaw. 
...â€
â€œgreat steady high, the sativa characteristics really stand out. Taste was nice and mellow. I perfered smoking it out of a bong over joints,blunts and vaped.â€

â€œI tried the kief version of Green Ribbon and it didn't disappoint! It had the same herbal, minty flavor of the flower version, but it packed the extra punch only kief can deliver. Really euphoric, heady high. Great for pain relief, insomnia, and anxiety. Yet, I could still focus and get things done. Wonderful strain all around! :)â€
â€œthe smell is something different not bad though. nugs are large and taste amazing.â€
â€œGreat.â€

â€œFirst 2 times I tried this strain I couldn't stand it ! But now that the homeboy has it dialed in , WOW! Incredible mix of strains - obviously stativa dominant ; but I can feel the affgo indica side for sure. A little to sativa for me I'm guessing 70/30 sativa . But a really well bred flower and a damn good high. 8/10â€
â€œThis sativa blend has a very smooth high" right from the initial hit and keeps you relaxed and smiling. I get a good "head high" for about 20 minutes then the creative
column5: time to do things kicks in. Good for helping get the morning started.â€"

column3: â€œgreen crack is my all time favorite and this one comes close to it as far as many of the qualities a very sweet pungent aroma and bright orange calyxes this rendition of green crack is similar but with a more pronounced body high making it a more balanced strain with a little spice in the sweet citrus flavorâ€
â€œGreat for lifting spirits but not so much for focusing.â€

â€œI smoked my flower of Green Ribbon in a bong and it was very smooth. I instantly felt good. My body felt amazing and like I was ready for anything. The more I smoked, the more tired I got. It kind of had a earthy taste so it was a little strange, but not bad. My bud was super crystally and looked beautiful. It hit fast and strong. My father in law said feels like gravity is pulling my legs to the floor". We all had ...â€"
â€œFanfrikinhoOOLydamtasticâ€
â€œPretty Stoney High... THC was almost 26% so it definitely packs a decent punch.  Gave me the hard core munchies.â€

In search of stronger bud to vape, something suitable for daytime consumption when there is shit to do, I came across Green Ribbon. It tested at 24+% THC and as you'd expect, this weed gets you lit. I feel very awake, very aware, with heightened senses. Primarily heady, less body high. My probl...â€

â€œtastes great, smells good, feels powerful. 

I always feel the need to be productive with this strain.â€
â€œgreat head high, very pungent. amazing strain recommended any timeâ€
â€œAfgoo x Arcata train wreck  x Green Crackâ€

â€œDecent bag aroma. Fruity and sage notes with an odd exhale. Very bright, uplifting high reminiscent of a good Orgo Blue Dream. Solid energy and calm focus. The high is so smooth and balanced I don't really get the perception of being high. I think I could smoke a whole eighth of this and still be functional. It makes an excellent daytime high and a great start to the day.â€
â€œDefintley one of my favorite sativa hybrids. Very focused strainâ€
â€œGreen crack x afgoo x arcata train wreckâ€
â€œnot a sativa fan but this is some dank I must admit one of the best headhighs I have ever hadâ€

â€œJust discovered Green Ribbon and gotta say its a new favorite. A light, pep filled high perfect for a wake and bake if you want to get shit done. Only drawback for me was the taste, but maybe it was just the particular sampling I had.â€
